description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qp4m","text":"We transformed E. coli bacteria with our plasmid in order to make more of it -- to use the bacteria as highly accurate DNA copiers. Now that we've grown a bunch of E. coli, we need to get the plasmid DNA back out. That's the point of a miniprep.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b4p6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"658s9","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"79pst","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"178AC5C018F811EDAF2B8B82C61E8674","height":302,"id":280517,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"cloning1.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it8hbvh6p.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it8fbvh6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it8gbvh6p.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/it8ebvh6p.webp","width":463}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3gsr7","text":"It is easy to get \"into a rhythm\" with this protocol and miss or mis-read important steps. {"blocks":[{"key":"4fnr9","text":"Remove the supernatant using a micropipettor and discard in the biological waste container. Try to get as much as you can without disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6b8pe","text":"Transfer another 1.5 ml of bacterial culture to the same microcentrifuge tube. Try to get as much as you can without disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pbqg","text":"Add   of resuspension buffer. Vortex to resuspend the pellet. Make sure it is completely resuspended -- there should be no visible clumps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8sdeu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"E8A8401018F811EDAF2B8B82C61E8674","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c56jp","text":"Add   lysis buffer. Invert the tube 4-6 times to mix and incubate at  for  . Do not vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"82ug8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"0F518F0018F911EDAF2B8B82C61E8674","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"150006C018F911EDAF2B8B82C61E8674","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"0CB2531018F911EDAF2B8B82C61E8674","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ro2o","text":"Add   of neutralization buffer and gently invert the tube until neutralized. Sample is neutralized when the color is uniformly yellow. Do not vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":26},{"style":"bold","offset":135,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1b5h4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"1D2746B018F911EDAF2B8B82C61E8674","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56qne","text":"Carefully transfer the supernatant (the liquid at the top, not the pellet at the bottom) to the spin column. Centrifuge  . title: Miniprep (NEB Monarch)
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"6cpqp","text":"The chemicals in a miniprep are moderately hazardous, especially if you were to get them in your eyes. Wear appropriate PPE, including a lab coat, gloves and safety glasses.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akkp6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb39s","text":"Additionally, this protocol generates BOTH biological AND chemical waste. Follow your instructor's guidelines for disposing of these two waste streams.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
